import React, { useEffect } from 'react' import { Link, useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom' import avatar from "../assets/profile.png" import styles from '../styles/Username.module.css'; export default function Username() { const navigate = useNavigate(); const setUsername = useAuthStore(state => state.setUsername); const formik = useFormik({ initialValues : { username : 'example123' }, validate : usernameValidate, validateOnBlur: false, validateOnChange: false, onSubmit : async values => { setUsername(values.username); navigate('/password') } }) return (
